title: Microsoft Patches Critical Entra ID Flaw Enabling Global Admin Impersonation Across Tenants
description: A critical token validation failure in Microsoft Entra ID (previously Azure Active Directory) could have allowed attackers to impersonate any user, including Global Administrators, across any tenant.
